name: Geoswap (Jirafey)
description:
Geoswap is still under development. Code for the game is in pure Python using pygame library (no game engine). Time limit: 3 days.  We are aware that the game is not yet ready for publishing, however, we still want to attend the game jam with an entry.  Currently as of writing this, we received no help from any graphic designers nor music composers/ SFX designers. So, just keep in mind this is solely made by programmers.

N0thing - Python Programmer

 Jirafey - Python Programmer,  game OST producer,  graphic design (outside of those built-in pygame graphics), sound designer

Ninja Coder - Python Programmer

Kat - game OST composer 

BaralTech -  menu graphics,  code (from his tutorial).
